mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (item_id, price, member_customer_id, member_seller_id, entry_date, quantity) VALUES(#{itemId}, #{price}, #{memberCustomerId}, #{memberSellerId}, NOW(), #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `order` INNER JOIN item ON order.item_id = item.id WHERE order.member_customer_id = #{memberCustomerId}
SELECT * FROM `order` INNER JOIN item ON order.item_id = item.id WHERE order.member_seller_id = #{memberSellerId}
SELECT * FROM `order` INNER JOIN item ON order.item_id = item.id WHERE order.id = #{id}
